page.title: 08FARMING.OTHER FARMS
page.content: HOWLETTS Howlett's Farm is owned by E.J. Colthup and Sons. It is 540 acres in size. Mostly cereal crops are grown but also pears, apples and cherries. Some sheep are also kept. The farm has a working oast and a beautiful farmhouse next to the farm buildings. YOUNG MANOR FARM Young Manor Farm is owned by Mr.E. Stanford.This farm is 156 acres in size and is worked by 3 men.The farm grows cereals and some sheep are kept. STILE FARM Stile Farm is owned by Mr.J.Smith. The farm is 414 acres and the main products are wheat and livestock.The farm has a milking shed and a big storage container for the milk. A lot of hay is cut during the summer to provide silage for food for the livestock in the winter.
